lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all need to help each other in order to make this a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies find and use the best technology for their business.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
I am fortunate enough to be born into a great family and country that provided me with unlimited opportunities. 
When you’re that lucky, you have a responsibility to share.
lenders.occupational_info: Pay it forward!!!

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: it can make a hug difference in someone's life and it costs me very little.

lenders.name: Dwane
lenders.loan_because: I can "really" help at least one other person on this great planet that we all live on. It makes me feel like I can actually  share part of the wealth  of my World.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just an old retired guy living on a hill top with my dogs and watching the World go spinning by. I do a pretty good garden and I am trying to learn to use a computer.

lenders.name: Re Bond
lenders.loan_because: One of the best ideas I have heard about to combat poverty, this is not a hand out. I feel lucky to have a chance to give a hand up!

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I
lenders.occupational_info: Nursing Student

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of ambition. We all need help sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in US Army.

lenders.name: Beata & Mariusz
lenders.loan_because:
Most of us at some point in our lives in one way, or another received some financial support from family, friends, or "strangers" in difficult times.
We're blessed to live in a highly developed country with lots of possibilities to grow financially and we also would like to extend the same invitation and landing hand to those, that are doing their best to meet their family's basic existential needs like food, shelter, health and education.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  I'm fortunate to be able to spare a few dollars here and there to help others help themselves.  What goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a firefighter in a small city providing fire protection and emergency medical services.  I also inspect public buildings to insure that they are safe for occupancy.

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to get a chance, make the most of it, and beat the odds.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others resolve disputes.  I read and write a lot, and face new challenges every day.  I enjoy every minute of it.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupation: mortgage banker, single mother of 2 boys

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.occupation: General Manager of a Non Profit

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I want to help end world poverty!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is challenging and rewarding.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be able to be become an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a transitional homeless shelter during the day, and at night ansd on weekends I am working on the theatre company that I started with college friends.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing  to do
lenders.occupational_info: I publish a newsletter for librarians in small libraries; I write books on library management; and I have a blog (on the Internet).

lenders.name: Tracie
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 4, two boys and two girls.  i stay home to take care of them.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to live a prosperous life!
lenders.occupational_info: Protecting and serving the people of my community

lenders.name: Wai Ling
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and add value to others people live.

lenders.name: Chris Van Wie
lenders.loan_because: It's the easiest thing in the world to do.
lenders.occupational_info: My role is to understand customer requirements and provide the solution using proprietary software.

lenders.name: Alison & Rob
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org offers such a simple, reasonable way to enable others to make their business dreams come true.  We loan because we should.
lenders.occupational_info: We create Internet-hosted software applications targeted to small business vertical markets. We also design and build large, custom applications for socially responsible clients. Our software is in use around the world in dozens of languages and currencies.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others live the best life they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are ill in the hospital.

lenders.name: Alexandria
lenders.loan_because: Life is about uplifting one another :O)!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a military broadcast journalist..I do television news and radio for the army.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because:
Deeds are like seeds that grow and multiply.  A small investment can begin to change the world.

Andy Andrews says it best in his book, "The Butterfly Effect". " There are generations yet unborn whose very lives will be shifted and shaped by the moves you make and the actions you take today.  And tomorrow.  And the next day.  And the next".

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I have always worked for myself....I was able to begin this process 40 years ago because of a small loan from my Dad.  Everyone who wants to be self employed and willing to do the work should have that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families create an environment of Wellness in their lives...health, wealth, family and social.  I am a manufacturer rep for a world wide health and wellness company.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Dreams, hopes and faith in others.  What life is all about.

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  If I can spend $25 on going to a movie or buying pizzas for dinner, I can certainly loan that amount to make a difference in someone's life!
lenders.occupational_info: I do not work outside the home due to a disability, but I am a leader of both boy and girl scouts, and strive to set a good example for them.

lenders.name: beth
lenders.occupation: neon sign maker, bead store owner

lenders.name: Hope
lenders.occupation: stay at home mom & substitute teacher

lenders.name: Darryl
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and would hope that i could pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have started a small home-based business, and keeping it going is tough; I want to help others who are tryng to make a living for themselves in whatever small way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: When physicians are called to consult on patients in the hospital, or when they admit a patient from the emergency room, it is my job to determine the correct level of service; then I submit the correct charge to the patient's insurance company for payment.

lenders.name: frann
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the right thing to do.  It is my pleasure to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: Nyanda
lenders.loan_because: Jesues said, "When you have helped the least of these you have helpe me."
lenders.occupational_info: I have been an Early Childhood Educater for since 1994 and I understand the joy of being an entrepreneur and making a difference in the lives of others.

lenders.name: Arlen
lenders.loan_because: I find it rewarding helping others who are in need!
lenders.occupational_info: It is in the field that i love, so i find it fun and interesting.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: In my country, I'm considered "low income", but in other countries, I would be considered rich.  That humbles me.  This is a way I can afford to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: my husband and I are following our dream of owning our own business and God has provided for us and our business is doing well.  We would like to help others have the same oportunity that we have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small plumbing company, mostly drain cleaning.  We provide a service that keeps indoor plumbing running and safe for our customers.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed, I want to ---- no ---- I NEED  to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: As a "rennie", a Renaissance Faire performer / merchant, I know what it means to have the help & good will of strangers. I've also been homeless and collected cans for my daily meal. I can really identify with the Kiva recipients. I am so BLESSED with my life now that I just HAVE TO pay it forward. God Bless you all.

lenders.name: Cliff
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Tannifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hope & be a resource.
lenders.occupational_info: Medical Staffing.

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people are the best thing to invest in

lenders.name: Jerrell
lenders.occupation: Stay at home mother, Business Owner
lenders.loan_because: I understand how hard life can be. .
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work outside the home for a great corporation, but decided that staying home with my kids was much more important. We have 5 children: a 7 yr old, 4 yr old twins, a 3 yr old, and my baby is 16 months old. We also just started our own trucking business! So we're busy, busy, busy! :)

lenders.name: Chris & Sara
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the power of small change making  a big difference

lenders.name: Sue Ann

lenders.loan_because: I want to enable someone to help themselves be independent. I hope this person would help another person & it would continue throughout the community.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with a foundations that gives money to organization to help them give back to the community.  One organization needed money to care for children while their parents worked.

lenders.name: John & Lisa

lenders.name: meg

lenders.loan_because: I'm paying it forward!

Melanie

lenders.loan_because: We need to take care of one another.

lenders.name: Inger

lenders.name: Ryan A
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide others with an opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: Im fortunate I am able to do this...

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I missed a chance to be in the Peace Corp when I was young.  Now I can do something good without leaving home.  Kiva.org is fun because I can hope to visit these countries some day.
lenders.occupational_info: Most of my life I have worked to construct buildings and later to inspect homes and commercial buildings to make sure they are safe.  More recently I worked to make sure new buildings are in places that are safe from floods, landslides, and natural hazards.

lenders.name: Golnaz
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a better life & no one deserves to live in poverty.

lenders.name: zannie
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to need money and have no where to turn. People have been generous to me and helped me out when I needed it.  I want to be able to do the same for others. I am happy to have the opportunity.

lenders.name: Josh & Christa
lenders.loan_because: God's love motivates us to love others, and to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: God has called us to encourage and equip this generation to love God and to love people!

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find ways to manage their emotions and mental health.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: While adopting my son from Viet Nam, I spent 3 weeks traveling around the country, and it became clear to me that: 1) a large proportion of the workforce were self-employed owners of busineses such as those funded by Kiva; and 2) small loans such as those made by Kiva could a make a significant difference for those wanting to begin or expand their businesses. I participate in this program because I wanted to do something meaningful, however small it is, to give something back to the amazing, generous people who gave me my son.

lenders.name: G.VEGA
lenders.loan_because: I think 100.00 in the hands of an individual is more powerful than 100 million dollars in the hands of a government.
lenders.occupational_info: Iwork in hospital admonistration for the largest, busiest county hospital system in the united states, i see first hand the health effects of poverty and hopelesness.

lenders.name: Rob&Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others!!

lenders.name: Kelli Rhyanne

lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker with Keller Williams Realty Mid-Willamette, here in Corvallis, Oregon. It is such a great feeling knowing I have a part in helping people realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Ayden & Ashlyn
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make a difference.

lenders.name: George

lenders.name: christina

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and feel this is a wonderful way to not only help others financially, but to spread a feeling of hope.
lenders.occupational_info: My business partner and I produce and distribute Christian radio programs as well as business commercials and other audio & video products.

lenders.name: The McCurry Family
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to support their family and make their dream happen!!
lenders.occupational_info: Brian helps people borrow money to buy homes, land and expand their businesses.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: This is not a bandaid solution. These loans are giving people the little lift that they need to live a stainable life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get fit, live a healthy a life and have a good time doing it!

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I have a little extra to share

lenders.name: Trey
lenders.loan_because: The internet has made us one village.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.occupational_info: Boring

lenders.name: Sarah Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I, too, dream of being successful. Why not help? Why not care? I don't have much to offer, but I'll offer what I can. We should all invest in people, dreams, hope -- not in that pair of designer shoes, that extra scoop of ice cream, that $50 hair cut. We can all cut down and still get what we want while at the same time helping others get what they need. :)

lenders.name: Scharma
lenders.loan_because: As the recipient of many kind acts in my life,  it's only fair to "pass it on."

lenders.name: Johnny & Lizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because it makes ya feel good when you can help other people, help themselves.
Ask & ye shall recieve says the Lord.
lenders.occupational_info:
We build things,stores,offices,
banks,hotels.With the help of others.

lenders.name: Ginny
lenders.loan_because: I really like the idea of making a big difference in someone's life.  With Kiva I'm able to directly do just that.  We all have the same hopes and dreams for our families and ourselves wherever we are in the world.  I love the idea of a loan rather than a gift as the loan empowers and increases the self-worth of the individual.  Thanks KIVA for a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a vending business.  I install machines into dentist and doctors offices and the children receive a token from the dentist to go to the machine and get a toy for themselves.  The kids get so excited to go see the dentist now, image :D

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I like to help those who want to work hard and build a better live for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Fabs
lenders.loan_because: i want to share my blessings!

lenders.name: Randy & Abbey

lenders.occupational_info: Randy is a Firefighter and Paramedic who helps people in emergency situations.  Firefighters/Paramedics save lives and property on a daily basis.  Abbey helps people by releasing tension and creating equilibrium of mind, body and soul through massage and body work techniques. She is also works in the hospital as a Labor and delivery nurse.

lenders.name: Prudence
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted my own business.

lenders.name: jacinda
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to help people in other countries who are trying to help their families and themselves.  I feel blessed to have been born in the U.S.  I want people to know other people care and want to help.  This is a great tool to help people across the world!

lenders.loan_because: Because it's a great idea!!!

lenders.occupational_info: I have come a long way, I work in Emergency Management now and after accomplishing alot being a single mother I want to help.

lenders.occupational_info: First of all, (During this hard hit economical time, it's a blessing to have a job. Overall, thank God for  everything, and always remember that someone somewhere still needs our help.

lenders.occupational_info: Help customers solve their computer problems.

lenders.occupational_info: Accounting & Financial management for small businesses.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Paying it forward :-)

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: When times were quite hard,  someone put new tires on  our indespensible family clunker so we could get to work & school.  It's wonderful to receive yet a blessing to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recent widow living on a pension.

lenders.name: Kathy J
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office during the day and do machine embroidery on garments as kj's krafts.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because:
As a successful hard working,goal oriented individual, I know that when you put your mind to something, it will come true.
There are people less fortunate than myself and part of my goals are to help people who want to better themselves through hard work.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have learned to do things for myself.
I am a self taught business woman who runs the money in my husbands electrical business.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: "Bob" says that we should help the humans.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to do something great, even in the smallest of ways, to make someone else's life better.  What goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a housewife and a textile artist.  As a textile artist I design artful gifts and also design prints for surfaces like fabric and paper.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small change in the world and help others achieve a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time fiber/mixed media artist. I bead, paint, embroidery and sew on textiles.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.occupational_info: Operate my own business with my wife

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that may just need the same oportunities that most of us take for granted I want to see underdeveloped countries do well I want the world to be the kind of place where we can all do well I dont want another child to go hungry
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Insurance secretary for a small company but more than anything I am just glad to be employed in this stressful economy.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: helping feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student working towards my own business goals.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: Encouraging those who are willing to better themselves is the right thing to do. And, Kiva is a way for us to do what God has commanded us to do in helping others, Regardless of whether we know them. Read Mark 12!
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for a communications company for 32 years, then as a bank manager for 3 years. I am now the Executive Director of Bristol Faith in Action.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: As a former single mother I know firsthand the struggles involved in raising a child alone. I had help along the way, and now I want to extend my hand to other folks who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist farmers with implementing practices on their land that protect water quality and reduce soil erosion, as well as create healthier living conditions for their livestock.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I can help.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate in my life and it feels good to help out when I can, especially knowing what a difference it can make in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell personal security items and sporting goods  to wholesale distributors.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: I am able.

lenders.name: Piet
lenders.loan_because: $100 000 I want to establish a professional succesful construction company
lenders.occupational_info: Iam a small business man with a dream of owning a Construction Company that build houses off plan and sell them back to public through bank finance.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's that simple.  What's worth more: the dollar of interest that my contribution would have made if it were to sit in my bank account, or lending that money so that it can make a difference in a family's life?
lenders.occupational_info: I develop new tools and techniques to help make finding new drugs to treat diseases easier.

lenders.name: Marika
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other woman who do not have the same opportunities as I have. I can life independently and do not need to stay with a man if I don't want to. I want to give other woman the same opportunity of independency.

lenders.name: Mansueto Ventures
lenders.occupation: Publisher of Inc. and Fast Company magazines
lenders.loan_because:
As a publication, we strive to tell the stories of entrepreneurs -- to give voice to their experiences, their visions, and values.

Entrepreneurs are the lifeblood of economies everywhere and we want to give entrepreneurs outside the U.S. a chance to succeed, so that they too may share their stories with the world.

In our quest to cover the pursuits of entrepreneurship, we will be blogging on our website, Inc.com, as we receive updates and progress reports on the businesses we have lent to.
lenders.occupational_info:
Inc. magazine and its online component Inc.com, is the leading resource for entrepreneurs and small business owners. 

Inc.com covers breaking news of the small business world and issues that affect entrepreneurs on a daily basis. The site also provides practical information to owners of small and mid-size companies on how to run a better business.

lenders.name: Eric T
lenders.loan_because: It works.

lenders.name: Ashley & Brian
lenders.loan_because: We think this is a great way to support the personal growth of individuals and their countries!
lenders.occupational_info: We study and work all the time! :-)

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be successful and provide for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I had been in sales for over 25 years, now my new job is a stay at home mom and I love it.  I enjoy knitting, bird watching, gardening and gatherings with family and friends.  I have always given time to my community, now I feel I am giving somethng beyond.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a frozen yogurt shop.

lenders.name: Alex & Bruce
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to find a way to make a real difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Cordell
lenders.loan_because: To many people live hand to mouth simply because they are not able to begin doing something that will help them lift themselves up.  I want to help and at the same time see that my contribution has an impact.  I do other charitable things but I do this because it is reaches out to people with real needs who are willing to help themselves and it does so in a way that I can participate and watch. There are a lot of organizations that ask for donations and ask you to trust them, with this I can at least see the success or failure myself. I did this for some time a stage name so to speak, but now that I have seen this work I want to use my real name and encourage others to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make decisions about how to best use their money to reach their own goals.

lenders.name: Jon and Janeal
lenders.loan_because: We want to change lives by extending the tender mercies of a loving Heavenly Father to our brothers and sisters around the world.  "When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God"
lenders.occupational_info: Much like Kiva borrowers, we create business ventures from a start up stage.  Jon also coaches entrepreneurs and business professionals for success.

lenders.name: Sylvia & Zoei
lenders.loan_because: Having lived in third world countries, I have seen first hand the impact a small amount of money can make to families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families, children and adolescents to improve their mental well being and help them work through life issues that prevent growth. Zoei is my granddaughter.. and my heart.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Shellie
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed here in America, we must help those who have less than ourselfs.

lenders.name: Robert  and Linda
lenders.loan_because: This is a way for me to help  people who can be successful if they are given an opportunity and some assistance.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell healthcare technology solutions.

lenders.name: Vandal
lenders.loan_because: I have more than most and like to share with those who might scratch my belly and let me lick their face.
lenders.occupational_info: I chase Otto a lot and sometimes he chases me. He's my buddy who gives to Kiva also.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world in any way I possibly can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fund raiser for a university.  I raise money for scholarships so that students who might not be able to afford an education can go to the university.

lenders.name: Mckenzie
lenders.loan_because: I got a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas and decided to check it out. Kiva is a great way to make microfinance more personal, and I can't wait to see my money at work improving someone's life!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an international affairs and elementary education student at Northeastern University in Boston, MA.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I can personally help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and edit all sorts of marketing text.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe
lenders.occupational_info: I manage multiple projects in the Western US to build cellular sites for the wireless carriers

lenders.name: Phuong
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that this is one of the best ideas I have encounter.  To be a part of this empowerment is very hopeful and uplifting.

lenders.name: Adrienne
lenders.loan_because: Increasing personal independance and the ability for upward mobility for yourself and family is vital to mental, emotional and physical well being.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom, Wife, Project Manager Consultant, Micro-Farmer.  Current passion is our growing organic microfarm, breeding rare Chincoteague Ponies and volunteering in my community to promote sustainable small scale agriculture.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women around the world achieve their goal of making a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I design tourism related advertisements.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I have had a great opportunity to earn money because I live in Canada. I would like to share that with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell on line through eBay.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful service that provides a way we can all connect and share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a busy glass company.  We have many employees and it is a very busy office & store.  The best way to describe my work is to say it is like juggling feathers in a hurricane!  Luckily my co-workers are wonderful and they all have a fantastic sense of humour so even thought it can be frantic sometimes, there are lots of opportunities for hilarity throughout the day.  I love my job.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I'm wealthy enough to share, and from my work, I know you can't take it with you anyway!
lenders.occupational_info: I look after people recovering from surgery. And I read. A lot. Hence the picture.

lenders.name: Janie - Dallas TX
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is part of who I am and I would not have survived some tough times if not for those who helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Raise money to revitalize a river that runs through our city and to create recreational and environmental opportunities near downtown and inner city neighborhoods.

lenders.name: DrJ
lenders.loan_because: ...from a seed blossoms a sunflower, from a note emerges a symphony...
lenders.occupational_info: ...helping people feel better by developing better nutrition...

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner, I understand the need for capital investment.  I feel fortunate to have access to that here in the US.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Consulting

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: While reading a Habitat Homeownership application, I read these words from an applicant: "All I need is a chance." Those simple words stuck with me, and I believe that Kiva gives chances; my hope is that they are given to truly deserving people who thrive because of them. It's all about giving a hand up, not a hand out (also Habitat inspired).

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: This organization is a great idea and I wanted to get involved with it!

lenders.name: Michael & Barbara
lenders.loan_because: This is a great program

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: As we are all connected and interdependent, sharing is a gift with endless returns... for humans and for the Earth.  Kiva is an excellent form of collaboration!
lenders.occupational_info:
...to create community & understanding.
...to choose love and compassion in each moment.

lenders.name: James & Aidan
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping a person pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.occupational_info: artist

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in random acts of kindness, giving back to help those less fortunate, raising people out of poverty, enriching people's lives. Remember that even a small donation helps someone reach a dream. An act of kindness can change a life.
lenders.occupational_info: Air Force Veteran

lenders.name: Susan A
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people. I have been fortunate and now that I am retired I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired US Army Sgt.  and am cruising the south pacific on my 32' sailboat....alone...except for my parrott "Elmer" who never shuts up

lenders.loan_because: I believe in small businesses - they can change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: My job helps keep helicopters safe to fly.

lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other.

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: it is a great opportunity to make a positive impact.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone on earth should be gainfully employed and , if not, should be given the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Now retired, I was a Catholic nun who taught for 20 years, then left the convent and went to Japan as an English professor. I was a music teacher and played organ, piano, viola and flute. I learned the koto and shamisen (musical instruments) in Japan and the Japanese tea ceremony. I speak and have taught Esperanto, the international language.

lenders.name: Katharine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide administrative support at Google.

lenders.loan_because: We are a group of students who work to raise money simply to use to help other people in the United States and the world.

lenders.loan_because: We are Blessed to have so many of our needs met.  We love the idea of being able to help others change their families future.

lenders.name: Jackie

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: Being able to help is a gift in itself

lenders.loan_because: I like to help.

lenders.name: Gary and Kim

lenders.occupational_info: Photographer and animal lover; married to John and mother to Scarlett.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: So important for people to get the leg up that they need. How can you deny a person the chance to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Kelly

lenders.occupational_info: i create/write/take photographs of beautiful and meaningful things...nature, people and places.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Here in the US, we are fortunate to be educated, obtain loans and open businesses.  I want to give that opportunity to others who might be less fortunate.  Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves and their livelihood.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell fair trade and eco-friendly products from around the world.

lenders.name: RALPH
lenders.loan_because: I like the personal satisfaction of empowering people rather than handing over something for free. Kiva loans allow them to take what we lend and make something lasting for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: In the business of lending for the American Dream: Buying your own home!

lenders.name: Marissa & Curtis
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the blessings that God has given us. We share in our church and we to share in the world.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I would like to change the world, and help others with the gifts I have been given. My goal is to fund 1,000 loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an internet marketing company that focuses on customer service and internet shopping.

lenders.name: Nathan and Natasha
lenders.loan_because: I have a good life, and I hope this can help someone else in need have a good life too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the Lexus Roadside Assistance accout, and we set up service, and dispatch someone to help owner's of Lexus' vehicles that are broken down.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me to help people in other countries with their business adventures.
lenders.occupational_info: A small business owner with my husband in concrete construction.

lenders.name: William J. McLoughlin
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help in the efforts to save the worlds chimpanzees for Dr Jane Goodall at http://janegoodall.org and also must help the worlds people so that there may be more resources to help the chimpanzees.
lenders.occupational_info: Green Energy

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I have a great respect for entrepreneurs.  My Dad, most of my 5 brothers and sisters, and my husband all own their own businesses.  Small businesses create jobs and that creates wealth.   KIVA is the most common-sense solution to poverty I have ever seen.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a college degree in teaching, but I am currently staying at home to raise my children and help my husband do the accounting for his businesses.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: It does make a difference.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with an amazing life. I feel so fortunate to have the things that I do that I'd like to give those less fortunate the same opportunities.

lenders.name: Whitney
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place :)

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be an American woman with exceeding opportunities that women of other countries don't have.

lenders.name: laurenM
lenders.loan_because: im able to...everyone should.

lenders.name: Bobbie
lenders.loan_because: these people want so little to get their business started.  It's humbling to be part of their sucess factors.

lenders.name: Maria

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory. I do experiments in order to improve our knowlegde about nature and to improve the way people live.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because:
I HAVE A SMOKE SHOP IN PHX AZ 
I NEED 10,000

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because:
small independent business and micro lending not only "rock"... but empower those who know how to make every dollar count. 
Do It Yourself...

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed and I can! This world needs all the help it can get!
lenders.occupational_info: In a wheelchair, retired and wanting to help someone thats not as lucky as me!

lenders.name: Joan & Blaine Wilson
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others.

lenders.name: Natalie

lenders.name: Abel

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: My eyes cannot see when I only look at me.

lenders.name: Mr. Whitford
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of 22 students living in southeastern Alberta.  The gift to Kiva was given to us by our teacher at Christmas in 2007 and renewed in the spring of 2009, then again in September of 2010.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because:
"In our willingness to give that which we seek, we keep the abundance of the universe circulating in our lives." - Deepak Chopra
(Plus, it's just a really cool thing to do!)
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible tourism development in Ecuador.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I know what its like to have big dreams.  We're all a community, we need to make things happen together!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nurse, I take care of a man in his home, who has no use of his arms, and has to have a machine breathe for him.  It is very fulfilling to help him live a full and nearly normal life.  But someday I would like to start a business, so actually you are very inspiring to me.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life!

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I can redisburse it repeatedly to help several people without losing a penny.

lenders.name: Dave & Barb
lenders.loan_because: Because we can, and we should.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can and I understand the feeling of wanting to be financially stable.

lenders.loan_because: This is so much fun! its like planting a tiny American Dreams in the poorest regions in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I take of computer networks and servers for small businesses

lenders.name: Meghann & Paul
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we hope for a better future for the whole world.

lenders.name: 36teen Design Studios
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with talent to create art in which gives me the opportunity to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Thanks be to God who has given me the talent and inspiration to create art in this moment in time. Because of my art, it has given me the opportunity to help others in Christ name.

lenders.name: avery and kait
lenders.loan_because: it helps those in need, and a great use of technology.
lenders.occupational_info:
Design Signs and Graphics.
Cut and Style hair

lenders.loan_because: This is the best way to create global growth; with the success of one economy follows the success of all economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly sit in a classroom, but when I am working for money, I stock shelves at a local store.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people and this is a wonderful idea.

I have worked with the elderly for 16 years. I LOVE my job!

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing to see how a few dollars from my pocket can be shared with an entrepreneur who can in turn use them to make a world of difference in his/her life!!

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because:
St Luke 6 vs 38
Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom.
For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in the Circle of Giving,  I am blessed, when someone support my business, so I have to sow into another person's life   to help them in any kind of way.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: I have been extremely fortunate to have a very loving family, 3 wonderful kids, a great job, and a house.

lenders.name: Michael
